scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && npm start -- --reset-cache
scripts.android:check: adb devices && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.warning-clean-up:
echo '\033[1;33m Please, uninstall the app from your phone or destroy the emulator
\033[0m'
scripts.reinstall-npm-modules: npm cache verify && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install
scripts.hyper-clean: npm run warning-clean-up && npm run clear:ios && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && npm run reinstall-npm-modules && npm run android:gradle-clean && react-native link
scripts.android:reverse-ports: adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081 && adb reverse tcp:3000 tcp:3000
scripts.android:release: cd android && ./gradlew clean  && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd app/build/outputs/apk && cp app-release.apk ./财录.apk && open .
scripts.android:staging: cd android && ./gradlew clean  && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant=releaseStaging && cd android/app/build/outputs/apk && cp app-releaseStaging.apk ./财录_staging.apk && open .
